allow: Bash(python3 -c " from PIL import Image import os, glob files = glob.glob\(''/Users/ys/src/github.com/ys/bonjour/content/posts/gwidel-log-fest/*.webp''\) for f in sorted\(files\)[:10]: img = Image.open\(f\) size = os.path.getsize\(f\) print\(f''{img.size[0]}x{img.size[1]} {size//1024}KB {os.path.basename\(f\)}''\) ")
